title: Goodreads Best Poems 2020
description: Goodreads Best Poems 2020 showcases the collected works of Aiman Sabir, Bernard Smith, Catherine Habbie, Frank Prem, G. R. Paskoff, H. Seeking, Joseph Murphy, Leon Stevens, Oliver Baer, Sean Dennis Lane, Sandra Black & The Muse.They are a collection of quick rhymes on topics as diverse as lockdown to assaults on the soul. Meet the authors as they pine on love, longing and remorse in the pandemic. Join them in laughter as they ponder the perils of cooking at Christmas or even have a book affair. Read a couple of the poems in French to lift your soul to sublime love.
author: Frank Prem
